name: lasagna
trans: 卤汁宽面(加肉汁﹑ 蕃茄和乾酪烹制的)

sentences.english: Organic farming is better for the environment.
sentences.chinese: 有机耕作对环境更有利。

sentences.english: organic gardening
sentences.chinese: 有机园艺

detailed_translations.english: relating to farming or gardening methods of growing food without using artificial chemicals, or produced or grown by these methods

name: vegan
trans: 纯素主义者(既不吃也不用任何动物产品, 如蛋﹑ 丝绸﹑皮革)

sentences.english: Our youngest daughter is a vegetarian.
sentences.chinese: 我们的小女儿是个素食主义者。

sentences.english: dishes suitable for vegetarians
sentences.chinese: 适合素食者的菜肴

sentences.english: I’m thinking about becoming a vegetarian.
sentences.chinese: 我在考虑戒除荤食。

sentences.english: Yasmin sticks to a strict vegetarian diet.
sentences.chinese: 亚斯敏坚持一种严格的纯素饮食。

detailed_translations.english: someone who does not eat meat or fish
Someone who is vegetarian never eats meat or fish

name: wild
trans: 野的, 野生的, 未驯化的

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["wild animals"]}
sentences.chinese: 野生动物

sentences.english: a field full of wild flowers
sentences.chinese: 遍地野花的田野

sentences.english: animals both wild and domesticated
sentences.chinese: 野生动物和家养动物

detailed_translations.chinese: 野生的；野蛮的；狂热的；荒凉的
detailed_translations.english: living in a natural state, not changed or controlled by people
in natural and free conditions, not kept or controlled by people
if plants run wild, they grow a lot in an uncontrolled way

sentences.english: ...a steak sizzling on the grill.
sentences.chinese: …一块儿在烤架上滋滋作响的牛排。

detailed_translations.english: good quality beef, or a large thick piece of any good quality red meat

sentences.english: I also got a microscope set and watched shrimp grow and things like that.
sentences.chinese: 我还得到过一个显微镜，观察小虾的成长和这些类似的事情。

sentences.english: The host generally pays, and no one needs to hear you gripe about appetizer prices or shrimp count.
sentences.chinese: 主人通常都会支付账单，没人想要听到你抱怨关于开胃菜的价格或者小虾的个数。

sentences.english: In summer midnight snack time, if you come across the Baisha street intersection, a big line of persons sitting by the avenue for taste the spicy shrimp .
sentences.chinese: 夏天里消夜时间你如果经过白沙路口就可以看到这儿林荫道上坐了一大排人，没错，他们就是冲着口味虾来的。

detailed_translations.english: a small sea creature that you can eat, which has ten legs and a soft shell

sentences.english: Would you like some salad with your pasta?
sentences.chinese: 你的意大利面要配些色拉吗？

sentences.english: a spinach salad
sentences.chinese: 菠菜色拉

detailed_translations.english: a mixture of raw vegetables, especially  lettuce  ,  cucumber  , and tomato

sentences.english: fields of corn
sentences.chinese: 一片片麦田

sentences.english: an ear of corn
sentences.chinese: 谷穗

detailed_translations.english: plants such as wheat,  barley  , and  oats  or their seeds

name: bean
trans: 豆子,豆荚,其他植物的类似种子

sentences.english: baked beans
sentences.chinese: 烘豆

sentences.english: Soak the beans overnight.
sentences.chinese: 把豆子浸泡一夜。

sentences.english: kidney beans
sentences.chinese: 芸豆

sentences.english: green beans
sentences.chinese: 青刀豆，四季豆

detailed_translations.chinese: 豆；嘴峰；毫无价值的东西
detailed_translations.english: a seed or a  pod (=  case containing seeds  )  , that comes from a climbing plant and is cooked as food. There are very many types of beans.
to hit someone on the head with an object

sentences.english: Marie stood at the sink, peeling potatoes (= cutting off the skin ) .
sentences.chinese: 玛丽站在洗涤槽边削土豆皮。

detailed_translations.chinese: [作物] 土豆，[作物] 马铃薯
detailed_translations.english: a round white vegetable with a brown, red, or pale yellow skin, that grows under the ground

sentences.english: a vinaigrette dressing
sentences.chinese: 醋油调味料

detailed_translations.chinese: 穿衣；加工；调味品；装饰；梳理
给…穿衣；为…打扮（dress的现在分词）

sentences.english: a rise in the price of oil
sentences.chinese: 石油价格的上涨

sentences.english: the importance of protecting our oil supplies
sentences.chinese: 保护我们石油供应的重要性

sentences.english: an oil refinery
sentences.chinese: 炼油厂

sentences.english: The bicycle chain needs oiling.
sentences.chinese: 自行车链条需要上油了。

detailed_translations.english: the thick dark liquid from under the ground from which petrol is produced
to put oil onto part of a machine or part of something that moves, to help it to move or work more smoothly

sentences.english: The  sugared  vinegar is  refined from the sugarcane and  pine.
sentences.chinese: 加糖的醋是从甘蔗和松木中精炼出来的.

sentences.english: To make the red-wine vinaigrette, whisk together the oil, vinegar and mustard in a medium bowl until well combined.
sentences.chinese: 制作红酒醋油沙司，将油、醋和芥末放在一个中等大小的碗里一起搅拌，直到混合均匀。

sentences.english: In cooking, vinegar can be used alone or to add flavor without calories to our food, but what will it do if we use it on our hair?
sentences.chinese: 在烹饪中，醋可以单独食用，也可以用作食物调味料不附加任何卡路里，但如果我们把它涂抹到头发上呢？

detailed_translations.english: a sour-tasting liquid made from malt or wine that is used to improve the taste of food or to preserve it

sentences.english: Check the tiles carefully before you buy them.
sentences.chinese: 购买之前要把瓷砖仔细检查一下。

sentences.english: A first rule in solving any mystery is to check the facts.
sentences.chinese: 揭开谜团的第一条规则是核查事实。

sentences.english: The police are failing to take adequate measures to check the growth in crime.
sentences.chinese: 警方未能采取适当的措施来阻止犯罪率上升。

sentences.english: Conduct regular checks on your water quality.
sentences.chinese: 要经常检查水质。

detailed_translations.english: to do something in order to find out whether something really is correct, true, or in good condition
the process of finding out if something is safe, correct, true, or in the condition it should be

sentences.english: Have you paid the phone bill?
sentences.chinese: 电话费你付了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a written list showing how much you have to pay for services you have received, work that has been done etc

sentences.english: I’m baking some bread.
sentences.chinese: 我在烤一些面包。

sentences.english: baked potatoes
sentences.chinese: 烤马铃薯

sentences.english: Bake at 250 degrees for 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 用250度的温度烤20分钟。

sentences.english: The bricks were baked in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 砖块放在太阳光下晒硬。

detailed_translations.english: to cook something using dry heat, in an oven

sentences.english: Pick a few leaves from the common lawn weed plantain, wash them, mash them, and apply as a poultice to the affected skin.
sentences.chinese: 从常见的草坪杂草车前草上摘几片叶子，洗净，捣碎，然后像膏药一样敷在受感染的皮肤上。

detailed_translations.english: a mixture of  malt  or crushed grain and hot water, used to make beer or  whisky

sentences.english: chocolate pudding
sentences.chinese: 巧克力布丁

detailed_translations.english: a hot sweet dish, made from cake, rice, bread etc with fruit, milk, or other sweet things added

name: split
trans: （使）分开；（使）断裂；（使）（团体）意见不合； （使）分裂

sentences.english: The branch split under their weight.
sentences.chinese: 树枝承受不住他们的重量断裂了。

sentences.english: In a severe gale the ship split in two.
sentences.chinese: 在一次强劲的大风中那艘船断成了两半。

sentences.english: If the chicken is fairly small, you may simply split it in half.
sentences.chinese: 要是鸡不太大，你把它分成两半就行。

detailed_translations.english: to divide or separate something into different parts or groups, or to be divided into different parts or groups
If something splits or if you split it, it is divided into two or more parts

sentences.english: a tart apple
sentences.chinese: 酸苹果

detailed_translations.english: food that is tart has a sharp sour taste
a  pie  without a top on it, containing something sweet

name: local
trans: 地方性的, 当地的, 本地的

sentences.english: local hospital
sentences.chinese: 当地医院

sentences.english: local residents
sentences.chinese: 本地居民

sentences.english: a local infection
sentences.chinese: 局部感染

detailed_translations.english: relating to the particular area you live in, or the area you are talking about

sentences.english: We watched the waves crashing against the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着海浪哗啦哗啦地冲击岩石。

sentences.english: The plates went crashing to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 盘子哗啦一声摔落到地上。

sentences.english: A large branch came crashing down .
sentences.chinese: 一根大树枝啪啦一声掉落下来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 倒下，坠落；发出撞击声；垮台，破产
detailed_translations.english: to hit something or someone extremely hard while moving, in a way that causes a lot of damage or makes a lot of noise
to have an accident in a car, plane etc by violently hitting something else
a sudden loud noise made by something falling, breaking etc

name: productive
trans: 生产的,生产性的,多产的

sentences.english: the economy’s productive capacity
sentences.chinese: 该经济体的生产能力

detailed_translations.english: relating to the production of goods, crops, or wealth

name: flexible
trans: 柔韧的, 灵活的, 易弯曲的, 可变通的

sentences.english: We can be flexible about your starting date.
sentences.chinese: 你具体从哪天开始，我们可以灵活一点。

sentences.english: The government needs a more flexible approach to education.
sentences.chinese: 政府在处理教育问题上需要更加灵活。

detailed_translations.english: a person, plan etc that is flexible can change or be changed easily to suit any new situation

sentences.english: our most dependable ally
sentences.chinese: 我们最可靠的盟友

sentences.english: a dependable source of income
sentences.chinese: 可靠的收入来源

detailed_translations.english: able to be trusted to do what you need or expect

name: powerful
trans: 强有力的, 强大的, 有权的, 强健的

sentences.english: He was one of the most powerful men in Bohemia.
sentences.chinese: 他是波希米亚最有权势的人物之一。

sentences.english: a very influential and powerful family
sentences.chinese: 很有权势的家庭

sentences.english: a powerful speech
sentences.chinese: 有感染力的演讲

detailed_translations.english: a powerful person, organization, group etc is able to control and influence events and other people’s actions

sentences.english: They are often available at a discount.
sentences.chinese: 它们经常可以以折扣价买到。

sentences.english: This has forced airlines to discount fares heavily in order to spur demand.
sentences.chinese: 这已经迫使多家航空公司对机票大幅打折以刺激需求。

detailed_translations.english: a reduction in the usual price of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 将…打折扣； 不信； 漠视， 低估
detailed_translations.english: If a shop or company discounts an amount or percentage from something that they are selling, they take the amount or percentage off the usual price

sentences.english: But if you lose your audience with technical explanations, you'll never get to what you want: a resolution so you can finalize your design.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果您用技术性的解释使受众迷惑，则您永远得不到希望达到的目的：完成设计的解决办法。

sentences.english: Rick accepted her offer of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 她请里克喝咖啡，他接受了。

sentences.english: He accepted the invitation to stay with us.
sentences.chinese: 他接受了邀请来我们家住。

sentences.english: His school reports said that he is always ready to accept a challenge (=  agree to do something difficult  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的学业报告上说他乐于接受挑战。

sentences.english: Please accept this small gift.
sentences.chinese: 请收下这份小小的礼物。

sentences.english: They offered me a job and I accepted.
sentences.chinese: 他们给我一份工作，我接受了。

sentences.english: He readily accepted her invitation (=  accepted it quickly  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他欣然接受了她的邀请。

detailed_translations.english: to take something that someone offers you, or to agree to do something that someone asks you to do

sentences.english: a total ban on cigarette advertising
sentences.chinese: 香烟广告的全面禁止

sentences.english: He looked at her with a total lack of comprehension.
sentences.chinese: 他一头雾水地望着她。

sentences.english: a sport that demands total commitment
sentences.chinese: 需要全身心投入的体育运动

detailed_translations.english: complete, or as great as is possible
to reach a particular total

sentences.english: the health service
sentences.chinese: 医疗保健服务

sentences.english: the postal service
sentences.chinese: 邮政服务

sentences.english: the police service
sentences.chinese: 警察部门

sentences.english: the prison service
sentences.chinese: 监狱系统

sentences.english: Workers in the emergency services (= the police, hospital, and the fire service ) are forbidden from striking.
sentences.chinese: 紧急服务机构的工作人员是禁止罢工的。

sentences.english: There has been a decline in public services in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来公共服务减少了。

sentences.english: {"GLOSS":["the police, hospitals, fire service, and organizations that provide basic things such as water, gas, or electricity"],"COLLOINEXA":["the essential services"]}
sentences.chinese: 基础服务部门

detailed_translations.english: the official system for providing something, especially something that everyone in a country needs to have, or the official organization that provides it

detailed_translations.chinese: 服务性的；耐用的；服现役的

detailed_translations.english: if someone services a machine or vehicle, they examine it and do what is needed to keep it working well

sentences.english: New evidence has confirmed the first witness’s story.
sentences.chinese: 新的证据证实了第一个证人的说法。

sentences.english: To confirm my diagnosis I need to do some tests.
sentences.chinese: 为了证实我的诊断，我要做一些化验。

sentences.english: Could you confirm the dates we discussed?
sentences.chinese: 你能确认我们商讨过的日期吗？

sentences.english: After a six-month probationary period, her position was confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 经过六个月的试用期后，她获准正式担任该职。

detailed_translations.english: to state or show that sth is definitely true or correct, especially by providing evidence

name: upgrade
trans: 升级; 更新, 安装程序更新的版本或用更新的零件替换系统零件 (计算机用语)

sentences.english: Helicopters have been upgraded and modernized.
sentences.chinese: 直升机已经升级并且装上现代化设备。

detailed_translations.english: to make a computer, machine, or piece of software better and able to do more things

sentences.english: the shouts of street vendors
sentences.chinese: 街头小贩的吆喝声

detailed_translations.chinese: 卖主；小贩；供应商；[贸易] 自动售货机
detailed_translations.english: someone who sells things, especially on the street

sentences.english: the basic principles of chemistry
sentences.chinese: 化学的基本原理

sentences.english: The basic idea is simple.
sentences.chinese: 基本思想很简单。

sentences.english: basic research
sentences.chinese: 基础研究

sentences.english: basic information
sentences.chinese: 基本信息

detailed_translations.english: forming the most important or most necessary part of something

sentences.english: The bulk of consumers are based in towns.
sentences.chinese: 大多数消费者都是城镇居民。

sentences.english: The dough will rise until it is double in bulk.
sentences.chinese: 面团会发酵到原来的两倍大。

detailed_translations.english: the main or largest part of something

sentences.english: Reporters asked him to clarify his position (= say exactly what his beliefs are ) on welfare reform.
sentences.chinese: 记者们要求他阐明他在福利改革问题上的立场。

detailed_translations.english: to make something clearer or easier to understand

sentences.english: Employees who refuse to relocate are in breach of contract (= have done something not allowed by their contracts ) .
sentences.chinese: 员工拒绝调动岗位是违反合约的。

detailed_translations.english: an official agreement between two or more people, stating what each will do

sentences.english: Wood is a durable material.
sentences.chinese: 木头是耐用材料。

detailed_translations.english: staying in good condition for a long time, even if used a lot

sentences.english: an enormous bunch of flowers
sentences.chinese: 巨大的花束

sentences.english: an enormous amount of money
sentences.chinese: 巨款

sentences.english: The team made an enormous effort.
sentences.chinese: 该队付出了巨大的努力。

detailed_translations.english: very big in size or in amount

name: invoice
trans: 发票; 发货清单; 服务费用清单

sentences.english: We will then send you an invoice for the total course fees.
sentences.chinese: 然后我们将寄给你一张全部课程费用的发票。

sentences.english: The agency invoices the client who then pays the full amount to the agency.
sentences.chinese: 那个代销处给客户开具发票，然后客户向代销处支付全部的款项。

detailed_translations.english: If you invoice someone, you send them a bill for goods or services you have provided them with

sentences.english: a working model (= one with parts which move ) of a steam engine
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽机车的活动模型

sentences.english: a top fashion model
sentences.chinese: 顶级时装模特

detailed_translations.english: a small copy of a building, vehicle, machine etc, especially one that can be put together from separate parts

name: negotiate
trans: 商议; 谈判; 协商

sentences.english: His first aim is to get the warring parties back to the negotiating table (= discussing something ).
sentences.chinese: 他的首要目标就是把交战各方拉回到谈判桌上。

detailed_translations.english: to discuss something in order to reach an agreement, especially in business or politics

sentences.english: Can I offer you something to drink?
sentences.chinese: 我给你拿点喝的好吗？

sentences.english: I can’t turn down the offer of a free trip to Milan!
sentences.chinese: 我怎能拒绝免费去米兰旅行的机会！

detailed_translations.english: to ask someone if they would like to have something, or to hold something out to them so that they can take it
a statement saying that you are willing to do something for someone or give them something

name: preliminary
trans: 初步的行动﹑ 事件﹑ 措施等

sentences.english: the preliminary stages of the competition
sentences.chinese: 竞赛的预赛阶段

sentences.english: a preliminary draft
sentences.chinese: 初稿

detailed_translations.english: happening before something that is more important, often in order to prepare for it

detailed_translations.chinese: 初步做法， 起始行为

name: process
trans: 过程, 程序, 步骤, 工序

sentences.english: the Israeli-Egyptian peace process
sentences.chinese: 以－埃和平进程

sentences.english: Recycling is an industrial process.
sentences.chinese: 回收利用是一个工业流程。

sentences.english: All university applications are processed through this system.
sentences.chinese: 所有大学入学申请都是由这个系统处理的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 过程，进程；；工序；工艺流程
detailed_translations.english: a series of actions that are done in order to achieve a particular result
to deal with an official document, request etc in the usual way

name: solid
trans: 牢靠的, 有信誉的, 可靠的

sentences.english: The lake was frozen solid .
sentences.chinese: 湖水冻得结结实实。

sentences.english: It was good to be back on solid ground again.
sentences.chinese: 又能踏上坚实的土地感觉真好。

sentences.english: Is the baby eating solid food (= bread, meat etc ) yet?
sentences.chinese: 宝宝吃固体食物了吗？

sentences.english: The ship’s sonar can detect the presence of solid objects in the water.
sentences.chinese: 船上的声呐能够探测出水中的固体物。

sentences.english: the properties of liquids and solids
sentences.chinese: 液体和固体的特性

detailed_translations.english: hard or firm, with a fixed shape, and not a liquid or gas
a firm object or substance that has a fixed shape, not a gas or liquid

name: specific
trans: 明确的, 特定的, 具体的

sentences.english: games suitable for specific age groups
sentences.chinese: 适合特定年龄组的游戏

sentences.english: a specific example of alcohol’s effect on the body
sentences.chinese: 酒精对身体影响的具体例子

detailed_translations.english: a specific thing, person, or group is one particular thing, person, or group
particular details

name: standard
trans: 普通的, 正常的, 一般的

sentences.english: Students have to reach a certain standard or they won’t pass.
sentences.chinese: 学生必须达到某一标准，否则无法通过。

sentences.english: The airline has rigorous safety standards.
sentences.chinese: 这家航空公司有严格的安全标准。

detailed_translations.chinese: 标准；水准；旗；度量衡标准
detailed_translations.english: the level that is considered to be acceptable, or the level that someone or something has achieved

detailed_translations.chinese: 标准的；合规格的；公认为优秀的
detailed_translations.english: accepted as normal or usual

name: overtime
trans: 加班; 加班时间; 超过时间

sentences.english: six hours’ overtime
sentences.chinese: 六小时的加班

sentences.english: They’re working overtime to get the job finished.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在加班赶工。

sentences.english: He’s been doing a lot of overtime recently.
sentences.chinese: 他近来加班很多。

sentences.english: Many employees work countless hours of unpaid overtime.
sentences.chinese: 许多员工无偿加班无数个小时。

sentences.english: Many of our offices will be working on overtime until the end of the year.
sentences.chinese: 我们的许多办事处都要加班到年底。

detailed_translations.chinese: [劳经] 加班时间；延长时间；加时赛
detailed_translations.english: time that you spend working in your job in addition to your normal working hours

name: responsibility
trans: 责任, 负担, 职责

sentences.english: Kelly’s promotion means more money and more responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 凯利获得提升，这意味着钱多了，责任也更大了。

detailed_translations.english: a duty to be in charge of someone or something, so that you make decisions and can be blamed if something bad happens

sentences.english: I can’t afford to spend any more money this week.
sentences.chinese: 这星期我没有能力花更多的钱了。

sentences.english: The repairs cost a lot, but it’s money well spent (= a sensible way of spending money ) .
sentences.chinese: 修理费很高，但这是该花的钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 度过，消磨（时光）；花费；浪费；用尽
detailed_translations.english: to use your money to pay for goods or services

sentences.english: ‘I’m so tired,’ she said.
sentences.chinese: “我太累了。”她说。

sentences.english: ‘Don’t cry,’ he said softly.
sentences.chinese: “别哭了。”他柔声说道。

sentences.english: Don’t believe anything he says.
sentences.chinese: 他说什么都不要相信。

sentences.english: I always said I would buy a motorbike when I had enough money.
sentences.chinese: 我一直说等我有了足够的钱就买一辆摩托车。

sentences.english: I would like to say how much we appreciate your hard work.
sentences.chinese: 我想说我们对你的辛勤劳动非常感谢。

sentences.english: ‘Why did she leave?’ ‘I don’t know – she didn’t say .’
sentences.chinese: “她为什么要离开？”“我不知道——她没说。”

sentences.english: Although he didn’t say so , it was clear that he was in pain.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他没说，但是他明显很痛苦。

sentences.english: (= why do you think that ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么会那么说呢？

sentences.english: I’d like to say a few words (= make a short speech ) .
sentences.chinese: 我想简单地说几句。

sentences.english: ‘So what are your plans now?’‘ I’d rather not say .’
sentences.chinese: “那么你现在的计划是什么？”“我还是不说的好。”

detailed_translations.english: to express an idea, feeling, thought etc using words

sentences.english: People who are wrongly arrested may be paid compensation .
sentences.chinese: 被误抓的人有可能得到补偿费。

detailed_translations.english: money paid to someone because they have suffered injury or loss, or because something they own has been damaged

name: wonder
trans: 惊讶, 怀疑, 惊奇, 想知道

sentences.english: What are they going to do now, I wonder ?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，他们现在打算怎么办呢？

sentences.english: He’s been leaving work early a lot – it makes you wonder , doesn’t it?
sentences.chinese: 他最近经常提早下班——让人觉得奇怪，是不是？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something that you are not sure about and try to guess what is true, what will happen etc

name: comfortable
trans: 自在的, 无忧无虑的

sentences.english: The bed wasn’t particularly comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 这床不大舒服。

detailed_translations.english: making you feel physically relaxed, without any pain or without being too hot, cold etc

sentences.english: I grabbed my bag and ran off.
sentences.chinese: 我抓起我的包就跑。

sentences.english: Two men grabbed her and pushed her to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 两名男子抓住她，把她推倒在地上。

sentences.english: Kay grabbed hold of my arm to stop herself falling.
sentences.chinese: 凯抓住我的手臂，以免自己摔倒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 抓取，攫取；赶紧做；抓住；抓，夺
detailed_translations.english: to take hold of someone or something with a sudden or violent movement
to suddenly try to take hold of something

sentences.english: This morning I went to a restaurant famous for its brunch buffet.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上我去了一个以自助早午餐而闻名的餐厅。

sentences.english: Instead of a seated dinner, consider hosting a Sunday brunch with Champagne Bellini’s.
sentences.chinese: 可以考虑举办一次有香槟酒的周日早午餐而非就坐的宴会。

sentences.english: Consider a luncheon or brunch, with a late night dance party that same evening or a few weeks later when you return from your honeymoon.
sentences.chinese: 提供午餐或是早午餐，在同一天晚上举行深夜舞会抑或是几周之后，即你们度蜜月归来时。

detailed_translations.english: a meal eaten in the late morning, as a combination of breakfast and  lunch

sentences.english: Nearly 70 percent of the population still live in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 人口中差不多有70%仍住在乡村。

sentences.english: Most of the world’s population doesn’t get enough to eat.
sentences.chinese: 世界上大多数人都吃不饱。

detailed_translations.english: the number of people living in a particular area, country etc

sentences.english: The average American has not even thought about next year’s election.
sentences.chinese: 普通的美国人甚至还没有想过明年的选举。

sentences.english: In an average week I drive about 250 miles.
sentences.chinese: 平常我每周开车约250英里。

detailed_translations.english: having qualities that are typical of most people or things

sentences.english: They had to struggle against all kinds of adversity.
sentences.chinese: 他们不得不同各种困境斗争。

detailed_translations.english: to try extremely hard to achieve something, even though it is very difficult

sentences.english: Francis is the same age as me.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西斯和我同年岁。

sentences.english: Experts disagree over the age of the drawings.
sentences.chinese: 专家对这些画作的年代意见不统一。

sentences.english: Dad retired at the age of 56.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸是在56岁时退休的。

sentences.english: We are living in the age of technology.
sentences.chinese: 我们生活在科技时代。

sentences.english: He was worried to see how much she’d aged.
sentences.chinese: 看到她苍老了许多，他很担心。

detailed_translations.english: the number of years someone has lived or something has existed
to start looking older or to make someone or something look older

sentences.english: I work in the oil industry.
sentences.chinese: 我在石油行业工作。

sentences.english: Italy’s thriving tourist industry
sentences.chinese: 意大利蓬勃发展的旅游业

sentences.english: Gould is a man of great industry.
sentences.chinese: 古尔德是一个很勤劳的人。

detailed_translations.english: businesses that produce a particular type of thing or provide a particular service

sentences.english: We sneaked out while Jessie’s mom wasn’t looking.
sentences.chinese: 我们趁杰茜的妈妈没有看到，偷偷地溜了出去。

sentences.english: If you look carefully you can see that the painting represents a human figure.
sentences.chinese: 如果仔细看，就会看出画上是一个人形。

sentences.english: Gina covered her eyes, afraid to look.
sentences.chinese: 吉娜捂住眼睛，不敢看。

sentences.english: Let me have a look at that – I think it’s mine.
sentences.chinese: 让我看一下那个东西——我想它是我的。

detailed_translations.english: to turn your eyes towards something, so that you can see it
an act of looking at something

sentences.english: a sound understanding of money and banking systems
sentences.chinese: 对货币和银行业体制的透彻理解

sentences.english: a sound knowledge of English
sentences.chinese: 扎实的英语知识

sentences.english: He has sound grasp of European history.
sentences.chinese: 他对欧洲历史有着透彻的理解。

detailed_translations.english: complete and thorough

sentences.english: I am feeling very depressed.
sentences.chinese: 我感到很沮丧。

sentences.english: Suddenly I felt a sharp pain in my shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 我突然感到肩部一阵剧痛。

sentences.english: I felt as if all my strength had gone.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得好象自己的力气已经全没了。

sentences.english: I felt like I was being kicked in the teeth every day.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉我好像每天都在经受挫折。

detailed_translations.english: If you feel a particular emotion or physical sensation, you experience it
to give you a particular physical feeling, especially when you touch or hold something

sentences.english: financial transactions
sentences.chinese: 财务往来

sentences.english: financial assistance
sentences.chinese: 财务援助

sentences.english: a financial advisor
sentences.chinese: 财务顾问

sentences.english: Organic farmers should be encouraged with financial incentives.
sentences.chinese: 应对实行有机栽培的农民给予经济上的鼓励。

sentences.english: It was a wonderful film, but not exactly a financial success (= something that makes a profit ) .
sentences.chinese: 这是一部出色的影片，但在票房上不是很成功。

detailed_translations.english: relating to money or the management of money

sentences.english: Andrew took a more optimistic view.
sentences.chinese: 安德鲁抱有更为乐观的想法。

detailed_translations.english: believing that good things will happen in the future

name: retire
trans: 退休, 退出, 退役, 退隐

sentences.english: At the age when most people retire, he is ready to face a new career.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数人退休的年纪，他准备要面对一项新事业。

sentences.english: I retired late that evening.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上我睡得晚。

detailed_translations.english: to stop working, usually because you have reached a certain age

sentences.english: a teaching career
sentences.chinese: 教学事业

sentences.english: He realized that his acting career was over.
sentences.chinese: 他意识到自己的演艺事业已走到了尽头。

sentences.english: a physiotherapist who wanted to make a dramatic career change by becoming an author
sentences.chinese: 想彻底改行当作家的理疗师

sentences.english: Nurses want an improved career structure (= better opportunities to move upwards in their jobs ) .
sentences.chinese: 护士希望有更好的职业架构。

detailed_translations.english: the series of jobs that a person has in a particular area of work, usually involving more responsibility as time passes

sentences.english: I find it hard to cope with change.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得很难适应变化。

sentences.english: scientists worried about climatic change
sentences.chinese: 为气候变化感到担忧的科学家们

sentences.english: A change in personality may mean your teenager has a drug problem.
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的孩子如果性格上发生了变化，可能意味着有吸毒问题。

sentences.english: No major changes were made to the book.
sentences.chinese: 这本书没有大的修改。

sentences.english: She had a change of heart (= change in attitude ) and decided to stay.
sentences.chinese: 她改变主意，决定留下来。

sentences.english: Family life has undergone dramatic change in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来家庭生活发生了巨大的变化。

sentences.english: Matt emptied the loose change from his pockets.
sentences.chinese: 马特把口袋里所有的零钱都掏了出来。

detailed_translations.english: the process or result of something or someone becoming different

name: promotion
trans: 晋升, 提升, 升迁

sentences.english: a society for the promotion of religious tolerance
sentences.chinese: 一个促进宗教包容的团体

sentences.english: I want a job with good prospects for promotion.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一份有良好晋升机会的工作。

detailed_translations.english: the activity of helping something to develop or increase

sentences.english: He got into his car and drove off.
sentences.chinese: 他上了车，随即开车走了。

sentences.english: Will someone switch the radio off?
sentences.chinese: 谁把收音机关掉好吗？

detailed_translations.english: away from a place

name: seem
trans: 看上去, 像是, 似乎

sentences.english: Ann didn’t seem very sure.
sentences.chinese: 安看来并不十分肯定。

sentences.english: It seems a foolish decision now.
sentences.chinese: 现在看来这是一个愚蠢的决定。

sentences.english: It seems like you’re catching a cold, Taylor.
sentences.chinese: 你好像感冒了，泰勒。

sentences.english: ‘So Bill’s leaving her?’ ‘ So it seems (= that seems to be true ) .’
sentences.chinese: “这么说来，比尔要离开她？”“好像是这样。”

detailed_translations.english: if something seems to be true, there are qualities or facts that make people think it is true

name: positive
trans: 肯定的, 绝对的, 积极的

sentences.english: At least something positive has come out of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 至少这个情况也产生了一些积极的东西。

sentences.english: Write down all the positive things about your life.
sentences.chinese: 记下生活中所有好的事情。

sentences.english: The rural environment was having a positive effect on the children’s health.
sentences.chinese: 乡村环境对孩子们的健康有好处。

sentences.english: It’s been a very positive experience for her.
sentences.chinese: 那对她来说是一次非常有益的经历。

sentences.english: TV can be a positive influence .
sentences.chinese: 电视也会有好的影响。

sentences.english: the positive contribution to the community made by many older people
sentences.chinese: 许多老年人为社区做出的积极贡献

sentences.english: It’s been a difficult time but, on the positive side , I feel physically fine.
sentences.chinese: 日子过得不容易，不过从好的方面看，我的身体状况还不错。

sentences.english: Women should be portrayed in a more positive light .
sentences.chinese: 应该从更正面的角度来描绘女性。

detailed_translations.chinese: 确实的， 明确的； 积极的， 肯定的
detailed_translations.english: good or useful

sentences.english: We plan to buy some property as an investment.
sentences.chinese: 我们打算买些房地产作为投资。

sentences.english: a huge investment of time and effort
sentences.chinese: 时间和精力的大量投入

detailed_translations.english: the use of money to get a profit or to make a business activity successful, or the money that is used

sentences.english: Silva issued a statement denying all knowledge of the affair.
sentences.chinese: 西尔瓦发表声明，宣称对此事一无所知。

sentences.english: a warning issued by the Surgeon General
sentences.chinese: （美国）卫生局局长发出的警告

detailed_translations.chinese: 发行； 分发， 发出
detailed_translations.english: to officially make a statement, give an order, warning etc
a subject or problem that is often discussed or argued about, especially a social or political matter that affects the interests of a lot of people

sentences.english: There was still one little nagging doubt at the back of his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他的心头仍有一丝挥之不去的疑虑。

sentences.english: Kim never doubted his story.
sentences.chinese: 例句：金对于他讲的事情从不怀疑。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being not sure whether something is true or right
to think that something may not be true or that it is unlikely

sentences.english: There was still one little nagging doubt at the back of his mind.
sentences.chinese: 他的心头仍有一丝挥之不去的疑虑。

sentences.english: Kim never doubted his story.
sentences.chinese: 例句：金对于他讲的事情从不怀疑。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being not sure whether something is true or right
to think that something may not be true or that it is unlikely

name: advise
trans: 劝告某人, 对 提建议

sentences.english: She needed someone to advise her.
sentences.chinese: 她需要有个人给她出主意。

sentences.english: ‘Make sure that you keep the documents in a safe place,’ Otley advised him.
sentences.chinese: “一定要把文件放在安全的地方。”奥特利向他建议道。

sentences.english: Keep us advised of (= continue to tell us about ) any new developments.
sentences.chinese: 请随时告诉我们任何新的进展情况。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone what you think they should do, especially when you know more than they do about something

sentences.english: We don’t allow diving in the pool.
sentences.chinese: 泳池内禁止跳水。

detailed_translations.english: to let someone do or have something, or let something happen

sentences.english: The antiseptic properties of copper sulphate have never been questioned.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸铜具有防腐性，这是不曾有过问题的。

sentences.english: Polyurethane is a kind of excellent anticorrosion material, material has excellent antiseptic effect on metal substrate.
sentences.chinese: 聚胺又是一种优良的防腐材料，对金属底材具有优异的防腐作用。

sentences.english: Don't just give money, go volunteer somewhere so you can have direct interactions with people. Your life is too antiseptic and it is making you a bit boring.
sentences.chinese: 不要只是捐钱，去某个地方做志愿者吧，这样你就可以和别人直接互动。你的生活太“防腐”了，你开始觉得有点无聊了吧。

detailed_translations.english: a medicine that you put onto a wound to stop it from becoming infected

sentences.english: Road safety is taught to young children to avoid road accidents.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子受到道路安全知识的教育，以避免交通事故。

sentences.english: It is important to take measures to avoid the risk of fire.
sentences.chinese: 采取措施避免火灾风险很重要。

sentences.english: Alan narrowly avoided an accident.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦险出事故。

detailed_translations.english: to prevent something bad from happening

sentences.english: minor cuts and bruises
sentences.chinese: 轻微的伤口和淤青

detailed_translations.english: a purple or brown mark on your skin that you get because you have fallen, been hit etc
to affect someone badly and make them feel less confident

sentences.english: The document was compiled by the Department of Health.
sentences.chinese: 这份文件是由卫生部汇编的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 编译；编制；编辑；[图情] 汇编
detailed_translations.english: to make a book, list, record etc, using different pieces of information, music etc

name: concern
trans: 关心, 顾虑, 挂念

sentences.english: He was moved by her obvious concern.
sentences.chinese: 她明显的关心使他感动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 关切的事，有关的事；关心，挂念；关系，关联；公司，企业
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of wanting someone to be happy and healthy

detailed_translations.chinese: 涉及， 有关； 使关心， 使担心
detailed_translations.english: if a story, book, report etc concerns someone or something, it is about them

sentences.english: Angry demonstrators demanded the resignation of two senior officials.
sentences.chinese: 愤怒的示威者要求两名高级官员辞职。

sentences.english: ‘Where are you going?’ she demanded angrily.
sentences.chinese: “你要去哪里？” 她气愤地质问道。

detailed_translations.english: to ask for something very firmly, especially because you think you have a right to do this
the need or desire that people have for particular goods and services

sentences.english: an electric drill
sentences.chinese: 电钻

sentences.english: rifle drill
sentences.chinese: 步枪操练

sentences.english: Drill a hole in each corner.
sentences.chinese: 在每个角上钻一个孔。

detailed_translations.english: a tool or machine used for making holes in something
to make a hole in something using a drill

sentences.english: In the course of these new developments the design of the entire simulator equipment and the Instructor Operating Station (IOS) have been improved and adapted to ergonomic requirements.
sentences.chinese: 在新的开发过程中，整个仿真设备和指令操作站（IOS）的设计经过了改善，满足人类环境改造学的要求。

detailed_translations.chinese: 人类环境改造学的；人类工程学的
detailed_translations.english: of or relating to ergonomics

sentences.english: ...a yoga expert.
sentences.chinese: …一位瑜伽专家。

detailed_translations.english: someone who has a special skill or special knowledge of a subject, gained as a result of training or experience

sentences.english: People with the virus may feel perfectly well, but they can still infect others.
sentences.chinese: 带有这种病毒的人可能毫无症状，却仍可能传染他人。

sentences.english: He thought they might infect others with their bourgeois ideas.
sentences.chinese: 他认为他们可能用中产阶级思想去影响别人。

detailed_translations.english: to give someone a disease

sentences.english: Stay for supper – I insist!
sentences.chinese: 留下来吃晚餐——一定的！

detailed_translations.english: to demand that something should happen

name: inspector
trans: 检查员; 视察员; 巡视员; 稽查员; 检验员; 督学.

sentences.english: ticket inspectors
sentences.chinese: 查票员

sentences.english: a Health and Safety inspector
sentences.chinese: 健康安全督察员

sentences.english: Standards of discipline at the school were strongly criticized in the inspector’s report.
sentences.chinese: 督察员在报告里狠狠地批评了这所学校的纪律水准。

detailed_translations.english: an official whose job is to check that something is satisfactory and that rules are being obeyed

name: procedure
trans: 程序, 过程, 手续, 步骤

sentences.english: On board, we were given the usual talk on safety procedures (= what to do if an accident happens, or to prevent an accident ) .
sentences.chinese: 在飞机上，我们听了例行的飞行安全讲解。

detailed_translations.english: a way of doing something, especially the correct or usual way

sentences.english: Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the factory.
sentences.chinese: 厂区严禁吸烟。

detailed_translations.english: to say that an action is illegal or not allowed

sentences.english: I recommend the butter chicken - it’s delicious.
sentences.chinese: 我推荐黄油焗鸡，非常好吃。

sentences.english: Can you recommend a good lawyer?
sentences.chinese: 你能介绍一位好律师吗？

detailed_translations.english: to say that something or someone is good, or suggest them for a particular purpose or job

sentences.english: The judge ruled that she should have custody of the children.
sentences.chinese: 法官判定孩子的监护权归她。

detailed_translations.english: to make an official decision about something, especially a legal problem

sentences.english: I’ve got a splinter in my finger.
sentences.chinese: 我的手指扎了一根刺。

detailed_translations.chinese: 碎片；微小的东西；极瘦的人
detailed_translations.english: a small sharp piece of wood, glass, or metal, that has broken off a larger piece
if something such as wood splinters, or if you splinter it, it breaks into thin sharp pieces

sentences.english: modern/classical/medieval etc architecture
sentences.chinese: 现代/古典/中世纪等的建筑风格

sentences.english: He studied architecture at university.
sentences.chinese: 他在大学里读的是建筑学。

detailed_translations.english: the style and design of a building or buildings

sentences.english: Much of the land was of poor quality.
sentences.chinese: 很多地的土质很差。

sentences.english: Use only high quality ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 只使用上等的材料。

sentences.english: the drug’s addictive quality
sentences.chinese: 毒品令人上瘾的特性

detailed_translations.english: how good or bad something is

sentences.english: a historic meeting of world leaders
sentences.chinese: 具有历史意义的世界领导人会议

sentences.english: ‘It is a historic moment ,’ he told journalists.
sentences.chinese: “那是历史性的一刻。”他告诉新闻记者。

detailed_translations.english: a historic event or act is very important and will be recorded as part of history

name: residential
trans: 适合居住的, 住宅的

sentences.english: a quiet residential neighbourhood
sentences.chinese: 安静的住宅区

detailed_translations.chinese: 居住的， 住宅的； 寄宿的， 住在住所的
detailed_translations.english: a residential part of a town consists of private houses, with no offices or factories

sentences.english: a house in a pleasant suburban district
sentences.chinese: 地处宜人郊区的一幢房屋

detailed_translations.english: an area of a town or the countryside, especially one with particular features

sentences.english: Only cheeses made in this area may be labelled ‘Roquefort.’
sentences.chinese: 只有这个地区出产的干酪才能被称作“罗克福尔干酪”。

sentences.english: Crime rates are much higher in urban areas.
sentences.chinese: 城镇地区的犯罪率要高很多。

sentences.english: an area of 2,000 square miles
sentences.chinese: 2,000平方英里的面积

sentences.english: The course covers three main subject areas.
sentences.chinese: 这门课程涵盖三大学科领域。

detailed_translations.english: a particular part of a country, town etc

sentences.english: We moved here because there was very little crime.
sentences.chinese: 我们搬到这里来是因为这里的犯罪率很低。

sentences.english: Police officers are being given new powers to help combat crime.
sentences.chinese: 警官们被赋予新的权力帮助他们打击犯罪。

sentences.english: a police crackdown on car crime
sentences.chinese: 警察对汽车犯罪活动的一次严厉打击

sentences.english: a town with a relatively low crime rate
sentences.chinese: 犯罪率相对较低的一个城镇

detailed_translations.english: illegal activities in general

sentences.english: She had a beautiful face.
sentences.chinese: 她面容秀美。

sentences.english: Her face was white with fear.
sentences.chinese: 她吓得脸煞白。

sentences.english: A big smile spread across his face.
sentences.chinese: 他的脸上绽开了灿烂笑容。

sentences.english: I felt like punching him in the face.
sentences.chinese: 我真想给他脸上来一拳。

sentences.english: The birds build their nests in the rock face.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸟在岩壁上筑巢。

detailed_translations.english: the front part of your head, where your eyes, nose, and mouth are

name: between
trans: 在......中间, 在 之间

sentences.english: He supplements his regular meals by eating between meals.
sentences.chinese: 他在两餐之间吃点东西来补充正餐。

sentences.english: The object of these experiments was to find the connection, if any, between the two phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 这些实验的目的就是探索这两种现象之间的联系，如果存在着任何联系的话。

sentences.english: A relieved smile spread over his face.
sentences.chinese: 他脸上绽开了宽慰的笑容。

sentences.english: a reasonable request
sentences.chinese: 合情合理的要求

sentences.english: Be reasonable — you can’t expect her to do all the work on her own!
sentences.chinese: 要讲道理，你不能指望她一个人干所有的工作！

sentences.english: I thought it was a perfectly reasonable (= completely reasonable ) question.
sentences.chinese: 我认为这个问题问得很有道理。

sentences.english: He had reasonable grounds (= good reasons but no proof ) for believing the law had been broken.
sentences.chinese: 他有合理的根据认为有人违法了。

sentences.english: good food at a reasonable price
sentences.chinese: 价格公道的美食

detailed_translations.english: fair and sensible

sentences.english: He threw the door open and ran down the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 他猛地打开门，往楼下跑去。

sentences.english: an open window
sentences.chinese: 打开的窗户

sentences.english: The gates swung silently open.
sentences.chinese: 大门悄悄地打开了。

sentences.english: The bar door flew open and a noisy group burst in.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧的门猛地弹开，冲进来一群吵吵闹闹的人。

sentences.english: All the windows were wide open (= completely open ).
sentences.chinese: 所有的窗户都大开着。

sentences.english: The museum is open daily in the summer months.
sentences.chinese: 夏季里这座博物馆每天开放。

sentences.english: Jack opened the window.
sentences.chinese: 杰克打开窗户。

detailed_translations.english: not closed, so that things, people, air etc can go in and out or be put in and out
to move a door, window etc so that people, things, air etc can pass through, or to be moved in this way

sentences.english: a clerical assistant
sentences.chinese: 文书助理

sentences.english: ...the assistant secretary of defence.
sentences.chinese: …助理国防部长。

detailed_translations.english: someone who helps someone else in their work, especially by doing the less important jobs

detailed_translations.chinese: 辅助的，助理的；有帮助的
detailed_translations.english: Assistant is used in front of titles or jobs to indicate a slightly lower rank. For example, an assistant director is one rank lower than a director in an organization.

sentences.english: a government employee
sentences.chinese: 政府雇员

detailed_translations.english: someone who is paid to work for someone else

name: welcoming
trans: 受欢迎的, 可喜的, 可任意的

name: professional
trans: 专业人员, 专业人才

sentences.english: What professional qualifications does he have?
sentences.chinese: 他有哪些专业资格？

sentences.english: You may need to seek professional help.
sentences.chinese: 你可能需要寻求专业帮助。

sentences.english: the terms that doctors and other health professionals use
sentences.chinese: 医师和其他保健专业人员使用的术语

detailed_translations.english: relating to a job that needs special education and training
someone who works in a job that needs special education and training, such as a doctor, lawyer, or architect

sentences.english: We are determined to bring the people responsible to justice.
sentences.chinese: 我们决意要将肇事者绳之以法。

detailed_translations.english: if someone is responsible for an accident, mistake, crime etc, it is their fault or they can be blamed

sentences.english: Laura is very mature for her age.
sentences.chinese: 相对她的年龄来说劳拉是很成熟的。

sentences.english: We’re mature enough to disagree on this issue but still respect each other.
sentences.chinese: 我们都很成熟，尽管我们对此事意见不同，但还是彼此尊重。

sentences.english: As the fish matures, its colours and patternings change.
sentences.chinese: 随着发育成熟，这种鱼的颜色和斑纹都会改变。

detailed_translations.english: someone, especially a child or young person, who is mature behaves in a sensible and reasonable way, as you would expect an adult to behave
to become fully grown or developed

sentences.english: They have two pets – a cat and a dog.
sentences.chinese: 他们有两只宠物，一只猫和一只狗。

sentences.english: We weren’t allowed to keep pets at school.
sentences.chinese: 学校里不许我们养宠物。

sentences.english: Rabbits make good pets .
sentences.chinese: 兔子是很好的宠物。

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["pet food"]}
sentences.chinese: 宠物粮食

sentences.english: a pet shop
sentences.chinese: 宠物商店

sentences.english: The policeman reached down and petted the wolfhound.
sentences.chinese: 警察伸出手，摸了摸那条猎狼犬。

detailed_translations.english: an animal such as a cat or a dog which you keep and care for at home
If you pet a person or animal, you touch them in an affectionate way
a plan, idea, or subject that you particularly like or are interested in

sentences.english: Does your rent include utilities?
sentences.chinese: 你的房租包括公用事业费吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 公用事业〔如煤气、电力等〕
detailed_translations.english: a service such as gas or electricity provided for people to use

sentences.english: I pay the rent at the beginning of every month.
sentences.chinese: 我每逢月初交付房租。

sentences.english: She rents out two rooms to students.
sentences.chinese: 她把两个房间出租给学生

detailed_translations.english: the money that someone pays regularly to use a room, house etc that belongs to someone else
to let someone live in a house, room etc that you own, or use your land, in return for money

name: split
trans: （使）分开；（使）断裂；（使）（团体）意见不合； （使）分裂

sentences.english: The branch split under their weight.
sentences.chinese: 树枝承受不住他们的重量断裂了。

sentences.english: In a severe gale the ship split in two.
sentences.chinese: 在一次强劲的大风中那艘船断成了两半。

sentences.english: If the chicken is fairly small, you may simply split it in half.
sentences.chinese: 要是鸡不太大，你把它分成两半就行。

detailed_translations.english: to divide or separate something into different parts or groups, or to be divided into different parts or groups
If something splits or if you split it, it is divided into two or more parts

sentences.english: Has your flat got a balcony?
sentences.chinese: 你的公寓有阳台吗？

detailed_translations.english: a structure that you can stand on, that is attached to the outside wall of a building, above ground level

sentences.english: Two lucky employees won a round-the-world trip.
sentences.chinese: 两名幸运的雇员赢得一次环游世界的机会。

sentences.english: It’s an 80-mile round trip (= a journey to a place and back again ) to Exeter.
sentences.chinese: 到埃克塞特往返有80英里。

sentences.english: I’m afraid you’ve had a wasted trip (= a trip in which you do not achieve your purpose ) . Mr Burgess has already left.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕你是白来一趟了，伯吉斯先生已经走了。

sentences.english: He was unable to make the trip to accept the award.
sentences.chinese: 他无法前去领奖。

detailed_translations.english: a visit to a place that involves a journey, for pleasure or a particular purpose
to hit something with your foot by accident so that you fall or almost fall

sentences.english: John and I sat up until the early hours chatting.
sentences.chinese: 我和约翰聊到凌晨才睡。

detailed_translations.english: to talk in a friendly informal way, especially about things that are not important

sentences.english: The sales figures won't be released until sometime next month.
sentences.chinese: 销售数据要到下个月的某个时候才会公布。

sentences.english: Sir Richard Marsh, the sometime chairman of British Rail
sentences.chinese: 理查德•马什爵士，英国铁路公司前董事长

detailed_translations.english: at a time in the future or in the past, although you do not know exactly when
former

sentences.english: You may call it harmless fun, but I call it pornography.
sentences.chinese: 你可能会说这是无恶意的小玩笑，但是我却认为这是色情。

sentences.english: I heard someone calling in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 我听到远处有人在叫。

detailed_translations.english: to use a word or name to describe someone or something in a particular way

sentences.english: There have been hints that he may take up coaching.
sentences.chinese: 他暗示过可能会出任教练。

sentences.english: ‘Look, I can’t tell you.’ ‘Oh, come on, give me a hint .’
sentences.chinese: “听着，我不能告诉你。”“得了，给我一点暗示吧。”

sentences.english: I made it clear I wasn’t interested in him, but he didn’t take the hint .
sentences.chinese: 我清楚地表明我对他不感兴趣，但他不明白我的意思。

detailed_translations.english: something that you say or do to suggest something to someone, without telling them directly
to suggest something in an indirect way, but so that someone can guess your meaning

name: couch
trans: 长椅, 卧榻, 睡椅, 长沙发

sentences.english: Tom offered to sleep on the couch.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆说他来睡沙发。

detailed_translations.english: a comfortable piece of furniture big enough for two or three people to sit on

sentences.english: Francis is the same age as me.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西斯和我同年岁。

sentences.english: Experts disagree over the age of the drawings.
sentences.chinese: 专家对这些画作的年代意见不统一。

sentences.english: Dad retired at the age of 56.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸是在56岁时退休的。

sentences.english: We are living in the age of technology.
sentences.chinese: 我们生活在科技时代。

sentences.english: He was worried to see how much she’d aged.
sentences.chinese: 看到她苍老了许多，他很担心。

detailed_translations.english: the number of years someone has lived or something has existed
to start looking older or to make someone or something look older

name: visit
trans: 拜访, 参观, 访问, 游览

sentences.english: Eric went to Seattle to visit his cousins.
sentences.chinese: 埃里克到西雅图去看望他的表兄弟。

detailed_translations.english: to go and spend time in a place or with someone, especially for pleasure or interest

sentences.english: He immediately booked a flight to Toulouse.
sentences.chinese: 他当即就订了去图卢兹的航班。

sentences.english: In 1968, the first supersonic airliner took flight (= began flying ) .
sentences.chinese: 1968年，首架超音速客机飞上天空。

sentences.english: When the alarm sounded, the whole gang took flight.
sentences.chinese: 警报响起，一帮人全逃跑了。

detailed_translations.english: a journey in a plane or space vehicle, or the plane or vehicle that is making the journey

name: offend
trans: 冒犯, 触怒, 伤害...的感情

sentences.english: His remarks deeply offended many Scottish people.
sentences.chinese: 他的话严重冒犯了许多苏格兰人。

sentences.english: The careful language is designed not to offend.
sentences.chinese: 使用谨慎的语言是为了不得罪人。

sentences.english: In Western countries girls are far less likely to offend than boys.
sentences.chinese: 在西方国家，女孩们远不像男孩们那样容易犯罪。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone angry or upset by doing or saying something that they think is rude, unkind etc
to commit a crime or crimes

name: mistake
trans: 错误, 过失, 误会

sentences.english: The most common mistake is to plant them too deep.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的错误就是把它们种得太深了。

sentences.english: She mistook my meaning entirely.
sentences.chinese: 她完全误解了我的意思。

detailed_translations.english: something that has been done in the wrong way, or an opinion or statement that is incorrect
to understand something wrongly

sentences.english: Edward can’t be here today, but he sends his apologies .
sentences.chinese: 爱德华今天来不了，他向大家表示歉意。

detailed_translations.chinese: 道歉；谢罪；辩护；勉强的替代物
detailed_translations.english: something that you say or write to show that you are sorry for doing something wrong

sentences.english: What a mess!
sentences.chinese: 太乱了！

sentences.english: Sorry – the place is a bit of a mess .
sentences.chinese: 对不起——这里有些乱。

sentences.english: When I got home, the house was a complete mess .
sentences.chinese: 我回到家时，屋子里一片狼藉。

sentences.english: You can make cookies if you promise not to make a mess in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 如果你答应不把厨房搞得乱七八糟，你可以去做甜饼。

sentences.english: She hates mess.
sentences.chinese: 她讨厌到处乱糟糟的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 凌乱状态，混乱的局面；困境
detailed_translations.english: if there is a mess somewhere or a place is a mess, things there are dirty or not neatly arranged

detailed_translations.chinese: 弄糟， 弄脏， 搞乱
detailed_translations.english: to make something look untidy or dirty

sentences.english: Was anyone hurt in the accident?
sentences.chinese: 事故中有人受伤吗？

sentences.english: Put that thing down - you might hurt someone with it.
sentences.chinese: 快把那东西放下，你会伤着别人的。

sentences.english: I didn’t mean to hurt your feelings.
sentences.chinese: 我不是故意要伤害你的感情。

detailed_translations.english: to injure yourself or someone else

sentences.english: The project aims to provide an analysis of children’s emotions.
sentences.chinese: 该计划旨在对儿童情绪作出分析。

sentences.english: a three-year research project
sentences.chinese: 一项为期三年的研究计划

sentences.english: The scheme will now be extended after a successful pilot project (= a small trial to test if an idea will be successful ) .
sentences.chinese: 试行成功后，该方案现在将得到推广。

sentences.english: The project is funded by Wellcome plc.
sentences.chinese: 这个项目由威康公司资助。

sentences.english: a project manager
sentences.chinese: 项目经理

sentences.english: a geography project
sentences.chinese: 一个地理课题

detailed_translations.english: a carefully planned piece of work to get information about something, to build something, to improve something etc

name: add
trans: 增加, 加入, 添加

sentences.english: If the mixture seems dry, add water.
sentences.chinese: 如果混合物看上去干，加点水。

detailed_translations.english: to put something with something else or with a group of other things

sentences.english: Rick accepted her offer of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 她请里克喝咖啡，他接受了。

sentences.english: He accepted the invitation to stay with us.
sentences.chinese: 他接受了邀请来我们家住。

sentences.english: His school reports said that he is always ready to accept a challenge (=  agree to do something difficult  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的学业报告上说他乐于接受挑战。

sentences.english: Please accept this small gift.
sentences.chinese: 请收下这份小小的礼物。

sentences.english: They offered me a job and I accepted.
sentences.chinese: 他们给我一份工作，我接受了。

sentences.english: He readily accepted her invitation (=  accepted it quickly  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他欣然接受了她的邀请。

detailed_translations.english: to take something that someone offers you, or to agree to do something that someone asks you to do

sentences.english: The red light means ‘Stop’.
sentences.chinese: 红灯表示“停”。

sentences.english: This light means you’re running low on fuel.
sentences.chinese: 这个灯亮说明汽油不多了。

detailed_translations.english: to have or represent a particular meaning

sentences.english: You can buy anything you want.
sentences.chinese: 你想要什么都可以买。

sentences.english: He was prepared to do anything to make a bit of money.
sentences.chinese: 只要能赚一点钱，他什么都愿意做。

sentences.english: Anything would be better than staying at home!
sentences.chinese: 做什么都比待在家里好！

sentences.english: You can write about swimming, skiing, or anything else you enjoy doing.
sentences.chinese: 你可以写游泳、写滑雪或者其他任何你喜欢的活动。

detailed_translations.english: any thing, event, situation etc, when it is not important to say exactly which

name: terrible
trans: 可怕的, 极坏的, 糟糕的

sentences.english: The hotel was absolutely terrible.
sentences.chinese: 这家宾馆糟糕透了。

sentences.english: I’d better write this down; I have a terrible memory.
sentences.chinese: 我最好把它记下来，我的记性很差。

sentences.english: You’re making a terrible mistake.
sentences.chinese: 你犯了一个极大的错误。

detailed_translations.english: very bad

sentences.english: I’m really sorry - it’s all my fault.
sentences.chinese: 我真的很抱歉——都是我的错。

sentences.english: I didn’t sleep well that night, but it was my own fault .
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上我没有睡好，但这是我自己的问题。

detailed_translations.english: if something bad that has happened is your fault, you should be blamed for it, because you made a mistake or failed to do something

sentences.english: The scandal did his career a lot of harm.
sentences.chinese: 丑闻对他的职业生涯造成很大损害。

sentences.english: Our children deserve protection from harm.
sentences.chinese: 我们的儿童理应得到保护免受伤害。

sentences.english: chemicals that harm the environment
sentences.chinese: 损害环境的化学品

detailed_translations.english: damage, injury, or trouble caused by someone’s actions or by an event
to have a bad effect on something

sentences.english: She was older than me, but that wasn’t really a problem.
sentences.chinese: 她比我年长，不过那不算什么问题。

sentences.english: She gave us 20 mathematical problems to solve.
sentences.chinese: 她让我们解20道数学题。

detailed_translations.english: a situation that causes difficulties

sentences.english: Drive safely!
sentences.chinese: 安全行驶！

sentences.english: I think we can safely assume that she will pass the exam.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们可以确信她会通过考试。

detailed_translations.english: in a way that is safe

sentences.english: Lori gets embarrassed if we ask her to sing.
sentences.chinese: 我们要是请洛丽唱歌，她就会难为情。

sentences.english: He looked embarrassed when I asked him where he’d been.
sentences.chinese: 我问他去了哪里，他显得很窘迫。

detailed_translations.english: feeling uncomfortable or nervous and worrying about what people think of you, for example because you have made a silly mistake, or because you have to talk or sing in public

sentences.english: I’m terribly sorry to have kept you waiting.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，让你久等了。

sentences.english: The coach was not terribly worried about his team’s poor performance.
sentences.chinese: 教练对他所执教球队的糟糕表现并不是十分担忧。

detailed_translations.english: very

sentences.english: He didn’t look the sort of man to forgive and forget (= forgive someone and no longer think about it ) .
sentences.chinese: 他看上去不是那种不记仇的人。

detailed_translations.english: to stop being angry with someone and stop blaming them, although they have done something wrong

sentences.english: Katie almost spilled her milk.
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂差点把牛奶洒出来。

detailed_translations.english: if you spill a liquid, or if it spills, it accidentally flows over the edge of a container
if you spill a liquid, or if it spills, it accidentally flows over the edge of a container

name: chip
trans: 削(或凿下)碎片, 将...削成

sentences.english: the age of the silicon chip
sentences.chinese: 芯片时代

sentences.english: chip technology
sentences.chinese: 芯片技术

detailed_translations.chinese: 屑片， 碎片； 炸土豆条； 集成电路片， 集成块； 缺口， 瑕疵
detailed_translations.english: a small piece of  silicon  that has a set of complicated electrical connections on it and is used to store and  process  information in computers
